subject: Help
description_text:
I have sim magic pedals... i bought the vam pro reactors and need a box to
plug into. If i buy the plus x box, can i use YOUR reactors on MY simmagic
pedals?

conversations.body_text: Hi Jimmy Secreet,  Does your Simagic pedal set have a dedicated port/connector for a haptics module? If it doesn’t, you can purchase a PlusX control box + power supply and use our control box specifically for telemetry/haptics output, while the Simagic pedals continue to handle the pedal input signals. This way, both systems can run independently without interfering with each other.
